subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Lakers’ Andrew Bynum is still adjusting to a new frontcourt partner, Pau Gasol, and is still learning the nuances of the game. But there is no understating his impact on the court.
snippet: The Lakers’ Andrew Bynum is still adjusting to a new frontcourt partner, Pau Gasol, and is still learning the nuances of the game. But there is no understating his impact on the court.
